õppetunnid muudavad õppimise lõbusaks ja: lessons make learning fun and enjoyable
1.1. Õppija keeletase määratakse testi j: 1.1. The language proficiency level of the learner is determined based on a test and subsequent interview between the learner and the instructor.
1.2. Koolitusele võetakse vastu õppijad,: 1.2. Learners who have successfully passed the language proficiency test, submitted a written application, signed a training contract, and paid the training fee based on the invoice issued prior to the start of the educational process are accepted for training. Partial payment is agreed upon in writing.
1.3. Koolituse pikkuse arvestamise aluse: 1.3. The duration of the training is measured in academic hours (1 academic hour equals 45 minutes).
1.4. Õppijale saadetakse e-posti teel hi: 1.4. A confirmation email is sent to the learner no later than 5 days before the start of the training, specifying the exact time and location of the training, as well as other important information.
2.1. Õppegrupi moodustamise aluseks on õ: 2.1. The formation of a study group is based on the language proficiency level of the learners at the beginning of the course, their basic language, and their preferences regarding the timing of the course.
2.2. Koolituse alustamiseks koostatakse: 2.2. A list of participants is compiled before the start of the training, based on which attendance is recorded. Attendance records are maintained by the instructor.
3.1. Koolituse eest tasumine toimub arve: 3.1. Payment for training is made based on the issued invoice. The invoice is sent via email. Payment must be made before the specified deadline.
3.2. Koolituse eest on võimalus tasuda o: 3.2. There is an option for installment payments for training, with the amount and schedule of payments being specified in the training contract.
3.3. Exemptions from payment for training are not provided.
3.4. Koolituse tundidest puudumist või k: 3.4. Skipping classes or interrupting training is not compensated for.
3.5. Keeltekoolil on õigus mitte tagasta: 3.5. The language school reserves the right not to refund training fees for interrupted courses to learners (except in cases where the learner has notified their withdrawal in writing no later than after the second class).
3.6. Keeltekool ei väljasta tunnistust v: 3.6. The language school does not issue a certificate or attendance certificate if the training has not been fully paid for.
4.1. Õpetaja haiguse tõttu või mõnel muu: 4.1. Lessons canceled due to the instructor's illness or other reasons related to the instructor are rescheduled by prior agreement with the learners and at a convenient time for them.
4.2. Keeltekoolil on õigus kursuse grupp: 4.2. The language school reserves the right not to open a group for the course if fewer participants have registered than planned.
4.3. Keeltekoolil on õigus muuta kursuse: 4.3. The language school has the right to change the number of hours and the cost of the course if fewer participants have registered for the group than expected, by notifying changes to group members before the start of the course.
4.4. Koolituse kohta tagasiside saamisek: 4.4. To receive feedback about the course, participants fill out a feedback questionnaire at the end of the course in electronic or paper form. The language school analyzes the results of the survey.
5.1. Osalema kursustel, millele ta on re: 5.1. Participate in the courses for which they have registered or confirmed their participation in writing.
5.2. Õigeaegselt tasuma õppetasu koolitu: 5.2. Timely payment for training based on the invoice issued by the training company.
5.3. Õppijal on õigus tasuda keelekursus: 5.3. The learner is provided with the right to pay for language courses in installments, up to a maximum of three payments according to the established payment schedule, which is stipulated in the training contract.
5.4. Õppijal on õigus loobuda keelekursu: 5.4. The learner is provided with the right to withdraw from the language course no later than after the second lesson, by notifying this in writing. Late withdrawal does not exempt the learner from the obligation to pay for the training.
5.5. Asudes õppima veebikursusel on õppi: 5.5. When starting an online course, the learner commits to having the necessary equipment for online learning (a computer with a camera and microphone) and fast, stable internet access.
5.6. Individuaalõppetunnist puudumisest: 5.6. In case of absence from an individual lesson, the learner notifies the instructor by phone, email, or message no later than 24 hours before the lesson. Failure to comply with this requirement obliges the learner to pay for the lessons in full.
5.7. Grupitunnist puudumisest teatab õpp: 5.7. In case of absence from a group lesson, the learner notifies the instructor by phone, email, or message no later than 2 hours before the lesson. Missed lessons are not compensated for or rescheduled later.
5.8. Koolituse kohta tagasiside saamisek: 5.8. To provide feedback on the course, participants fill out a feedback questionnaire at the end of the course in electronic or paper form, where they evaluate the course content, their language progress, study materials, teaching methodology, lesson structure (pace, atmosphere, clarity of explanations, opportunities for practicing the language being studied, etc.), the instructor's work, and organizational aspects of the course, and also provide suggestions for improvements in content and format of the training. The questionnaire is anonymous to ensure objectivity.
6 Õpingute lõpetamise tingimused ja välj: 6 Õpingute lõpetamise tingimused ja väljastatav dokument
6.1. Õpingute eduka lõpetamise eelduseks: 6.1. Õpingute eduka lõpetamise eelduseks on osalemine vähemalt 80% tundidest ja iseseisvate tööde tegemine.
6.2. Kursuse lõpetamiseks sooritavad õpp: 6.2. Kursuse lõpetamiseks sooritavad õppijad tõenduspõhise testi kõigi nelja osaoskuse tõendamiseks. Test loetakse sooritatuks vähemalt 60% tulemusega.
6.3. Tunnistuse saab õppija kursuse lõpu: 6.3. Tunnistuse saab õppija kursuse lõpus juhul, kui õpingute lõpetamise nõuded on täidetud ja õpiväljundid saavutatud (testi tulemus vähemalt 60%).
6.4. Tõendi täienduskoolituses osalemise: 6.4. Tõendi täienduskoolituses osalemise või selle läbimise kohta saab õppija juhul, kui ta osales vähem kui pooltes tundides või kui ta ei saavutanud õppekava lõpetamiseks nõutud õpiväljundeid. Tõend väljastatakse ka juhul, kui koolitusel ei kontrollitud õpiväljundite saavutamist või õppija katkestas koolituse. Sellisel juhul tuuakse tõendil (või selle lisas) välja ka info selle kohta, milliste teemade käsitlemisel õppija osales.
Õppekorralduse ja kvaliteedi tagamise al: The Fundamentals of Curriculum and Quality Assurance
1.1 Keelerõõmud Keeltekool OÜ (registrik: 1.1. The language school Keelerõõmud Keeltekool OÜ (registration number 16806917) operates in accordance with current legislation in the field of adult education and other related regulatory documents.
1.2 Keelerõõmud Keeltekool OÜ on täiska: 1.2. The language school Keelerõõmud Keeltekool OÜ is an educational institution for adults and school students (educational program group; language learning), providing Estonian and English language learning.
1.3 Õppetöö viiakse läbi õppetööks sobiv: 1.3. Classes are held in rented classrooms in Narva or in the client's premises. The classrooms are equipped with all the necessary equipment including desks and chairs that can be easily rearranged for group and pair work. All rules for using equipment, fire safety requirements, and sanitary norms are observed on the premises. The training rooms meet health protection requirements. Courses can also be conducted online using the platform Zoom. Online teaching allows working with both the entire group and dividing the group into smaller groups for group and pair work. The teacher has the necessary equipment and digital skills to use various platforms (Padlet, Quizlet, Kahoot, etc.) required for this form of education.
1.4 Individuaalõppena toimuvate koolitus: 1.4. In conducting individual lessons, education is carried out based on an individual plan tailored to the learner's needs, based on the corresponding curriculum for the relevant language proficiency level.
1.5 Koolituse pikkuse arvestamise alusek: 1.5. The duration of the course is measured in academic hours (1 academic hour equals 45 minutes).
1.6 Keelerõõmud Keeltekool OÜ asjaajamis: 1.6. The office languages at Keelerõõmud Keeltekool OÜ are Estonian, Russian, or English.
1.7 Keeleoskustasemeid mõistetakse Euroo: 1.7. Language proficiency levels are determined in accordance with the European Framework for Languages.
1.8 Õpingute alusdokument on õppekava, k: The main document of education is the curriculum, which defines
1.8.1 õppekava nimetus;: 1.8.1. the name of the educational program;
1.8.5 õppe kogumaht, sealhulgas kontaktõ: 1.8.5. the total volume of education, including contact and/or distance learning and the proportion of self-study;
1.8.9 lõpetamise tingimused ja väljastat: 1.8.9. conditions for completing education and the documents issued;
1.8.10 1koolituse läbiviija kvalifikatsi: 1.8.10. description of the qualifications and work experience of the instructor.
2.1 Grupiõpe s.o Õppevorm, kus keeleõpp: 2.1 Group Learning - a form of education where simultaneously 6 to 12 students with similar language proficiency levels are taught.
2.2 Minigrupiõpe s.o Õppevorm, kus kee: 2.2 Mini-group Learning - a form of education where simultaneously 3 to 5 students with similar language proficiency levels are taught.
2.3 Individuaalõpe s.o Õppevorm, kus ke: 2.3 Individual Learning - a form of education where simultaneously 1 to 2 students with similar language proficiency levels are taught.
2.4 Õpe toimubKontakt- või veebiõppe vor: 2.4 Education is conducted in the form of face-to-face or distance learning

If there are many students, groups are formed depending on the language proficiency level and the base language.
4.2 Koolitusele võetakse vastu õppijad,: 4.2 Students are admitted to training if they have successfully passed the language proficiency level test, submitted a written application, signed a training contract, and paid the tuition based on the invoice issued before the start of the educational process. Partial payment is agreed upon in writing.
4.3 Asudes õppima veebikursusel on õppij: 4.3 When starting training in a web course, the student must have their own equipment for online learning (computer with a camera and microphone) and fast, stable internet connection.

9. Õpingute lõpetamise tingimused ja väl: 9. Conditions of Completion and Issued Certificate
9.1 Õpingute eduka lõpetamise eelduseks: 9.1. To successfully complete the training, participation in no less than 80% of the classes and completion of home assignments are required.
9.2 Kursuse lõpetamiseks sooritavad õppi: 9.2. Upon completion of the education, students take a test to confirm proficiency in all four skills. The test is considered passed with a result of no less than 60%.
9.3 Kursuse lõpus saab õppija tema oskus: 9.3. Upon completion of the course, the student receives a certificate reflecting their skills and progress if the completion conditions are met and educational outcomes are achieved.
9.4 Tõend täienduskoolituses osalemise v: 9.4. A certificate of participation or completion of additional education is issued to the student if they participated in less than half of the classes or if they did not achieve the required educational outcomes according to the curriculum. The certificate is also issued if educational outcomes are not assessed during the course or if the student interrupts their education. In such cases, the certificate includes information about the topics covered by the student.
1.1. Koolirõõmud Keeltekool OÜ juhatuse: 1.1. The name of the educational institution founded by the management of Keelerõõmud Keeltekool OÜ is Koolirõõmud Keeltekool OÜ.
1.2. Koolirõõmud Keeltekool OÜ korraldab: 1.2. Koolirõõmud Keeltekool OÜ organizes supplementary language courses in Estonian and English languages for adults and school children.
2. Õppekavade kvaliteedi tagamise tingim: 2. Conditions and Procedure for Ensuring the Quality of Educational Programs
2.1. Koolirõõmud Keeltekool OÜ õppekavad: 2.1. The development of educational programs at Koolirõõmud Keeltekool OÜ is based on legislation on supplementary education for adults, the standard of supplementary education, and the European Framework Document for Language Learning.
2.2. Õppekavade täiendamine toimub vajad: 2.2. Updates to educational programs are made as needed and in accordance with legislation.
3. Koolitajate kvaliteedi tagamise tingi: 3. Conditions and Procedure for Ensuring the Quality of Teachers
3.1. Koolirõõmud Keeltekool OÜ lähtub tä: 3.1. Koolirõõmud Keeltekool OÜ adheres to the ethical code of adult education teachers, which serves as the basis for ensuring the quality of teaching and learning.
3.2. Õpetajal on erialane kõrgharidus ja: 3.2. The teacher holds relevant higher education and has experience in adult education.
3.3. Õppekvaliteedi tagamiseks osaleb õp: 3.3. To ensure the quality of teaching, the teacher regularly undergoes additional training; digital skills, active teaching methods, development of teaching materials.
3.4. Õpetaja töökvaliteeti hinnatakse ko: 3.4. The quality of the teacher's work is assessed based on oral and written feedback from participants after the completion of the course.
4. Õppekeskkonna kvaliteedi tagamise tin: 4. Conditions and Procedure for Ensuring the Quality of the Learning Environment
4.1 Kõik registreerunud saavad teabe koo: 4.1. All registered participants receive necessary information about the course organization; schedule, location of classes or access to the online platform, and study materials, no later than one week before the start of the course.
4.2 Keelekoolituse läbiviimiseks on lood: 4.2. A supportive learning environment has been created for conducting language courses
4.3 Õppeklassid asuvad Narvas, renditud: 4.3. The classrooms are located in Narva, in rented premises or in the client's premises. All classrooms meet health and safety requirements. There is sufficient space and light for each participant in the classrooms. The classrooms are equipped with modern presentation equipment and internet access.
4.4. Drinking water is available to participants.
5. Täienduskoolituse kohta tagasiside ko: 5. Procedure for Collecting Feedback on Supplementary Education
5.1 Iga kursuse lõpul täidavad osalejad: 5.1. At the end of each course, participants fill out feedback surveys, available online or in paper format, evaluating the course content, their language progress, study materials, teaching methodology, organization of classes (pace, atmosphere, clarity of explanations, opportunities for language practice, etc.), the teacher's work, and organizational aspects of the course, and also make suggestions for improving the content and format of the education.
5.2 Õpetaja analüüsib tagasisideküsitlus: 5.2. The teacher analyzes the feedback to improve all the mentioned aspects.
